com.myscript.atk.diagram.widget

Interface DiagramWidgetApi


  • public interface DiagramWidgetApi
    This interface describes the public API of the Diagram Widget.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DiagramWidgetApi.DiagramListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.
      static class  DiagramWidgetApi.DiagramTool 
      static interface  DiagramWidgetApi.OnPenListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when the user is writing on the widget.
      static interface  DiagramWidgetApi.OnUndoRedoListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when at least one of Undo/Redo stacks has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCertificate

        boolean registerCertificate(byte[] certificate)
        Register the certificate to use the Diagram Widget.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Parameters:
        certificate - Byte array containing the certificate.
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is registered or false on failure or if a certificate is already registered.

      • configure

        boolean configure(String bundleName,
                  String config)
        Configure the Diagram recognition engine. With diagram widget, you can configure the recognition engine with 3 bundles : analyzer, shape, and text. You have to make three separate calls. In case of bad configuration, the IDiagramEventListener.onError(String errorMessage) callback is triggered.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Configuration is a lengthy process that may take up to several seconds, depending on the shape resource attached. It is recommended to setup a configure listener to detect the end of the configuration process.

        Parameters:
        bundleName - Name of the configuration bundle, (for example, "shape").
        config - Name of the configuration mode, (for example, "standard").
        Returns:
        true if the configuration was successful, false if not.

      • configure

        boolean configure(String bundleName,
                  String config,
                  String extendedConf)
        Configure the Diagram recognition engine. With diagram widget, you can configure the recognition engine with 3 bundles : analyzer, shape, and text. You have to make three separate calls. In case of bad configuration, the IDiagramEventListener.onError(String errorMessage) callback is triggered.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Configuration is a lengthy process that may take up to several seconds, depending on the shape resource attached. It is recommended to setup a configure listener to detect the end of the configuration process.

        Parameters:
        bundleName - Name of the configuration bundle, (for example, "shape").
        config - Name of the configuration mode, (for example, "standard").
        extendedConf - Name of the optional extended configuration, (for example, "setWordListSize").
        Returns:
        true if the configuration was successful, false if not.

      • addSearchDir

        void addSearchDir(String directoryName)
        Define the location of analyzer, shape, text recognition resources.

        The Diagram recognition resources are normally loaded automatically from default application data location: Application bundled data directory

        You can choose to load the Diagram recognition resource from a different path using this function.

        Parameters:
        directoryName - directoryName to shape and text resources

      • clearSearchPath

        void clearSearchPath()
        Clear the search directories list.

      • configuration

        com.myscript.atk.diagram.DiagramConfiguration configuration()
        Get the configuration object of the diagram component. This object allows you to tune the behavior of the diagram widget, for instance by enabling/disabling guides, auto recognition... etc.
        Returns:
        the current configuration

      • penDown

        void penDown(com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo captureInfo)
        Triggers a pen down.
        Parameters:
        captureInfo - The pen down position. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

      • penMove

        void penMove(com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo captureInfo)
        Triggers a pen move.
        Parameters:
        captureInfo - The pen move position. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

 float x;   // x coordinate

      • addStroke

        void addStroke(List<com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo> points)
        Adds a stroke to the MyScript document model.
        Parameters:
        points - the list of points constituting the path of the stroke 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };
